attributes.review: i got this app 🥵 so i could get🤠 unbiased🤑and extremely accurate🤯 information about our 😻 gloriously tanned president 🥰 and when i opened it 😧 my sleep paralysis demon🦶ate my toes 🤢and sent old men 😤 to take my turtle 😓and steal his 😚 bank loans 🦶and then 👶 they took🤕 my 2002 converse 🧃 shoe laces 🪁and when i fought back 🧦 trump sent his little 👠 trumpets after me🐍 and then i frantically deleted the app 🐟 and they disappeared ✨ so the moral of the story 🧚‍♀️ is don’t get this app💕💕💞💗❣️
attributes.title: Terrible!!😠 MAGA no more!!

attributes.review: It takes up to half an hour to load, never works on my WiFi so I have to disconnect from it, and when it does load it glitches. The only time this app worked, I looked outside and there was a big orange man in my front yard chanting “build that wall” and “all lives matter”. He then stole my children, rode off on a horse, and told me he was taking them to “the island”? If anyone knows where that is, please let me know!!
attributes.title: Very Disappointed

attributes.review: Chile anyways... this app made my phone glitch so BAD LIKE LITERALLY I COULDNT USE MY PHONE AT ALL. I almost ended up buying a new phone smh. Anyways this app gives false propaganda and is feeding our children horrible views and ideologies🥱🤬. It’s sickening to see stuff like this now especially in 2020. Lordt please get this app off of the App Store please🥶. Not to mention I keep seeing a Cheeto man show up😡 I hate it so much. So if you download this app supporting this Cheeto man lemme tell ya something sweets... CATCH THESE MFING HANDS💅🏾💅🏾❤️❤️✨✨

attributes.review: I wanted to try to find any reason why this was a good idea, but the app was a genuine waste of time. The joke that is our president has an app for re-election, now I don’t know about you, but I’m not a fan of toupee wearing oranges running a country. Mind you, a “free” country. Not just “free” for straight white people, so I’m good, get him out of here. Do not get this app, it’s just going to waste your time, and probably make you angry at the end of the day.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever got on my phone

attributes.review: This app broke my phone😭how you may ask? Well it turned my phone orange and didn’t let me see any BLM content on any apps😠My phone also smells like a Cheeto Puff now🤢 As Karen would say, can I speak to your manager??? Please NOBODY download this!!!! This app also caused many people to die since I’m a doctor at Grey-Sloan Memorial Hospital in Seattle and this made my phone break I couldn’t get any calls/updates on my patients and several people died🥺😠😠😠Frick you Trump

attributes.review: this app is horrible! 😫 i had left the house 🏡 to go walk🚶🏾‍♀️my fish 🐠inside the fridge and when i came back inside my phone📱had legs! 🦵🏾IT WAS TERRIFYING!!!! 😱 and then the legs went away 💃🏾 so i picked up my phone📱only to see that the screen turned orange 🟠 and then BOOM 💥 ... donnie’s head 👨🏻‍🦰 started growing out of my phone📱smh. he called 📞me the n word 🤭and then grew some more legs 🦵🏾🦵🏾and ran away!🏃🏾‍♂️ its a good thing i have the unlimited data plan 😌
attributes.title: this app is the 14th reason why

attributes.userName: Gamer from the Realm of Swords
attributes.review: This app is laced with propaganda and so-called “news” that paints trump in a good light. I am not a radical liberal but I have a college education and I know what’s factual and what isn’t. Trump wants your private information so he can sell it later to turn a profit. That’s how he stays rich— buying your data and selling it the highest bidder. The worst app ever. I can’t believe Apple allowed this divisive app to be allowed on their App Store. Shame on Apple and shame on trump.
attributes.title: Propaganda and forced release of my info??

attributes.review:

He is stealing our personal information and using it against us. This app has also leaked my address to Democrats and now I have ppl at my house all the time. My kids hate me now.
attributes.title: It stole information from me 😡

attributes.review: I CANT WALK DONALD WHAT DID YOU DO!? I downloaded the app so I could actively support our amazing Cheeto puff president. As soon as I open the app the overwhelming amount of colors on the homepage caused me to go into anaphylactic shock and i passed out. When I woke up I couldn't move my legs!!! it's almost like they walked away:(( Downloading this app literally caused me to be confined to an electric wheelchair. HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO TAP DANCE NOW?!?!?! Look, I love you Donnie, I really do, but this app is just too poorly made. Do better 😔
attributes.title: I AM UNABLE TO WALK ❌❌
